title: Shin Hakkenden
synopsis: Based on the long cherished, classic Japanese novel Nanso Satomi Hakkenden by Bakin Kyokutei Takizawa (1767), a modified version of it was made into animation.
voices: ['Suzuki, Masami', 'Asakawa, Yuu', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Tatsuta, Naoki', 'Nishimura, Tomohiro', 'Komatsu, Rika', 'Kikuchi, Shiho', 'Okiayu, Ryoutarou', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Koyasu, Takehito']
staff: [['Takahashi, Hideo', ['Sound Director']], ['Inokawa, Shintarou', ['Episode Director']], ['Endou, Tetsuya', ['Storyboard']], ['Ookura, Masahiko', ['Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Mechanical Design']]]
